name: DesignMantic
tagline: Our logo maker is fast, easy and free to use
description:
DesignMantic.com provides complete DIY branding solutions for startups and small businesses - starting with a logo.
We believe a logo is the face of your brand, and all branding materials depends on it. That is why we’ve created a logo maker that is fast and easy-to-use for startups and entrepreneurs to get started with their brand identity design. 

The best part about DesignMantic’s logo maker is that it offers seamless branding solutions with the same logo. Once you choose a logo design, you can get themed branding material designs as well, ready for download.
DesignMantic also offers custom logos so business owners don’t have to worry if they need to tweak their designs. 
Products
Our range of DIY design tools include logo maker, business card maker, letterhead, envelope design maker, T-shirt design maker, flyer maker, social media cover maker, website builder, wedding monogram maker, and wedding invite maker. And we aim to grow the list every day.
